services.title: Our Automation Solutions
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of automation services designed to streamline your operations and drive growth.

service1.title: Ghost Clock – Frictionless Time Tracking
service1.description: Turn time tracking into an invisible, autonomous process. Your team clocks in with a simple scan, and you get real-time productivity analytics delivered to you. Forget spreadsheets and chasing people down; focus on what really matters: leading your team.

service2.title: Self-Sorting Folders
service2.description: Imagine a digital archive that builds and organizes itself. Our solution automatically classifies, tags, and backs up every file based on client, date, or project. Your digital chaos becomes a strategic, intelligent asset that works for you, even when you're not looking.

service3.title: Chaos-Free Requests
service3.description: Centralize all internal requests—from supplies to support tickets—into a single, intelligent, and fully traceable channel. Get real-time reports on demand, eliminate bottlenecks, and make the phrase 'I sent you a message' a relic of the past.

service1.title: Ninja Capture from WhatsApp & Social Media
service1.description: Convert unstructured conversations from social media and WhatsApp into strategic data. Our system extracts customer names, orders, and addresses, logs them into your digital dashboard, and triggers an automatic confirmation. You just focus on closing the next sale.

service2.title: Point of Sale without the Expensive System
service2.description: Your phone or tablet becomes your cash register, your reporting engine, and your historical log. Instantly record sales, track performance, and generate reports without being tied to expensive software or complex inventory systems. It's pure, real-time control in your pocket.

service3.title: Dormant Customer Radar
service3.description: Our system is a proactive growth engine that automatically detects customers who haven't returned. It then lets you re-engage them with a personalized promotion or a timely reminder, turning potential churn into a new sales opportunity without you lifting a finger.

service1.title: Self-Generating Metrics
service1.description: What if your KPIs weren't just tracked, but delivered to you, fully analyzed? Get daily or weekly reports on sales, top products, and profit margins sent directly to your email or WhatsApp, in Excel or PDF. No formulas, no waiting, just actionable insights on demand.

service2.title: Pre-Built Accounting
service2.description: Upload your raw financial data—expenses, income, operational costs—and our system transforms it into clear balance sheets, performance alerts, and visual graphs. Your numbers, ready to be shared with partners, accountants, or investors in a single click.

service3.title: Intelligent Weekly Summary
service3.description: Each team member logs their achievements, and our system automatically consolidates the data into a high-impact, visual report. Perfect for board presentations, client updates, or internal meetings. It builds itself, so you can focus on the narrative.

service1.title: Silent Guardians on Your Devices
service1.description: We implement a proactive security posture by scanning your systems (without installing a thing) for unauthorized apps, suspicious files, or policy violations. You receive automatic alerts, enabling your IT team to be predictive, not just reactive.

service2.title: Clean Drive, Agile Company
service2.description: Automate digital hygiene by systematically deleting obsolete files, duplicates, or unnecessary data. You set the rules—by date, type, or size—and our system reclaims storage and reduces risk. Your infrastructure, on autopilot.

service3.title: Scripts with Brains
service3.description: The manual, repetitive IT tasks you do every day—renaming files, exporting data, moving folders—are now self-executing processes powered by pre-configured logic. The best part? No one notices it happened... only that the work is done, flawlessly.
